constantValues: The way a donor or prospect is commonly addressed via written communication, such as hard-copy letters and email messages.  Nonprofits and foundations typically address major donors by different salutations depending on the scenario.  A medical doctor could be addressed as "Doctor Smith" when the organization reaches out regarding in-country field volunteerism that the person performs.  On the other hand, the same individual might be referred to as "Mrs. Smith" as part of her household being solicited for a major gift.

definitions.description: The way a donor or prospect is commonly addressed via written communication, such as hard-copy letters and email messages.  Nonprofits and foundations typically address major donors by different salutations depending on the scenario.  A medical doctor could be addressed as "Doctor Smith" when the organization reaches out regarding in-country field volunteerism that the person performs.  On the other hand, the same individual might be referred to as "Mrs. Smith" as part of her household being solicited for a major gift.

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Salutation

members.description: Reason for the status of the Salutation

members.name: addressLabelLine1

constantValues:
The first line of the address label when printing an envelope
>Mr John Smith
Mrs Wilma Smith
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.description:
The first line of the address label when printing an envelope
>Mr John Smith
Mrs Wilma Smith
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.name: addressLabelLine2

constantValues:
This is the 2nd line of the envelope usually the 2nd person in the household if applicable
Mr John Smith
>Mrs Wilma Smith
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.description:
This is the 2nd line of the envelope usually the 2nd person in the household if applicable
Mr John Smith
>Mrs Wilma Smith
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.name: addressLabelLine3

constantValues:
This is the 3rd line of the address which could be an Organization name or a C/O
Mr John Smith
Mrs Wilma Smith c/o Anytown Company
1234 Main Street
Anytown, USA 11111

members.description:

1234 Main Street

members.name: insideSalutation

constantValues: This is the information that appears after the word Dear on the letter sent to the donor.

members.description: This is the information that appears after the word Dear on the letter sent to the donor.

members.name: isPreferred

constantValues: Indicates that this Salutation may be applied by business logic when matches on other selection criteria (Comm. method, Account, Constituent Type) are not found.

members.description: Indicates that this Salutation may be applied by business logic when matches on other selection criteria (Comm. method, Account, Constituent Type) are not found.

members.name: onBehalfOfAccount

constantValues: Indicates that this Salutation should be applied when the Customer is contacted in the capacity of their role on the indicated Account.

members.description: Indicates that this Salutation should be applied when the Customer is contacted in the capacity of their role on the indicated Account.
